thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Ray Mariani
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Ray Mariani

author: Ray Mariani
title: Ray Mariani
text:
I had never dealt with banggood before and now wonder why I had not. They have quality products, very reasonable prices, provide excellent
feedback and back this all up with stellar service. I would not hesitate to recommend them based on my recent experience. kudo's to being a company that keeps the customer at the forefront and stands behind their products and service. A
